name: Ghost Valley
overview: Ghost Valley Spirits and Magic written by Christian Nennewitz using Tuned Simons Basic - 20 scary game screens - colorful state-of-the-art Hires graphics - 15-page, richly illustrated operating instructions - completely programmed in BASIC (TSB). - no cheap machine language tricks - intelligent password system - for beginners, advanced users and professionals - no time limit, no rush, no stress - compatible with TheC64 (Mini) and TheVIC20 - Music and sound conducted and programmed by Chris N. - no joystick required
